block.p: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation said today that it would delay for about a week the announcement of the winning bidder for the failed Bank of New England. The announcement was originally scheduled for April 16 but now is scheduled for April 24. Alan Whitney, an F.D.I.C. spokesman, said the agency needed more time to review the complex offers and that no bid had been eliminated.

The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation said today that it would delay for about a week the announcement of the winning bidder for the failed Bank of New England.
